page.title: 14CLUBS Leisure (Adults)
page.content: {Blackboys and Framfield}have many combined clubs and societies.They produce a diary of events which give notice of club meetings.Blackboys and Framfield Horticultural Society recently had a supper with their flower show.There is an over-60's club for older people whilst young children have a playgroup and a Mother and Toddlers Club.On the sports side there is badminton,cricket,football, stoolball and tennis clubs. At {Sharlands}there is a painting class, along with swimming classes. Drama and ballet clubs run at private houses.The Monday Club Women's Institute meet regularly,as do the Wives Group. At{Possingworth Manor}the owner is a keen member of the Sussex Wildlife organisation and he hosts the "Farming and Wildlife Group". (Joanne Forster, Emma Carpenter, Christian Pepper.)
